        Returns the number of unset actions
        Returns:

      • unsentActionsInQueue

        public long unsentActionsInQueue(java.lang.Class<? extends Action> actionClass)
        Returns the number of unsent actions that are instances of the given class

      • enqueue

        public java.lang.Long enqueue(Action action)
        Assings an action id and queues the action for sending.

        close_session action has a special handling. Transport is closed automatically after it has been transmitted.

        Parameters:
        action - action to queue

      • addEventListener

        public void addEventListener(java.lang.Class<? extends Event> eventClass,
                             TransportEventListener<? extends Event> eventListener)

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
        Terminates connection and clears queues. Practically prepares this transport for new session.

      • init

        protected void init()
        Prepares this transport for new session. Effectively clears all queues and initializes new worker threads

      • setSessionId

        public void setSessionId(java.lang.String sessionId)
        Sets sessionId for resume_session action
        Parameters:
        sessionId - session id

                           Event event)

      • rewindQueue

        protected void rewindQueue()
        Rewinds queue for new connection. Unacknowledged actions will be sent again when session is resumed.

      • setNetworkAvailability

        public void setNetworkAvailability(boolean available)
        Informs transport about network availability. Transport should close connection if network goes unavailable and try an instant reconnect when it is available again. This is most useful on mobile devices.
        Parameters:
        available -
